column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I ordered a personal pizza and the chicken Marsala pasta. I am no deep dish conneissour
column2: but the previous restaurant that I tried deep dish
column4: if I didn't like the pizza here
column5: at least I'd be able to enjoy the pasta. I will say that $10.75 for a personal size pizza is a bit ridiculous as this is football stadium pricing
column6: but that pretty much seems to be the norm. The personal pizza was good
column7: better than the first I had at a competitor
column8: but def not enough for dinner... more like an appetizer or snack. So IMO
column9: even as one person for dinner I'd order a small pizza. The pasta on the other hand was loaded with chicken and mushrooms and super filling! Thankfully the chicken breast was cut up unlike other Marsalas where you're given the full breast.
